articles.author: Agency Staff
articles.title: Prosus to buy up Naspers stake in major overhaul - TechCentral
articles.description: Prosus on Wednesday announced plans to acquire up to 45.4% of shares in parent Naspers in a deal aimed at moving part of the value of their massive stake in Tencent to Europe from Africa.
articles.content:
Prosus and Naspers CEO Bob van Dijk
Amsterdam-based technology investor Prosus on Wednesday announced plans to acquire up to 45.4% of shares in its parent, South Africa’s Naspers, by issuing new Pro… [+1524 chars]

articles.title: EU could quickly approve Pfizer jab for 12-15 year olds: EMA chief - manilastandard.net
articles.description: The head of the European Medicines Agency said Monday that BioNTech/Pfizers jab against COVID-19 could be approved in the EU for 12- to 15-year-olds soon, perhaps as early as this month.
articles.content:
